info.lead: MP's vote discrepancy from the majority vote of the parliamentary group they are affiliated with, compared to the average and maximum value.
text: For all voting events we calculate majority vote for each parliamentary group. Majority vote refers to the option that a majority of MP's voted for.
Za vsakega poslanca najdemo trenutno poslansko skupino in izračunamo odstotek ujemanja glasov v obdobju članstva. Pri vseh izračunih ignoriramo glasovnice "ni prisoten".
